title: Need Font ID for Famous "I Want You" Uncle Sam Poster
content:
I'm sure many are familiar with this famous wartime poster. I'm just curious to see if anyone knows what font is being used for the "I Want You..." portion. Thanks for any help you can provide!

-J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311084304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/uncle_sam_6662.jpg)
author: jgabriel

comments.content: You could probably get close with different styles of [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311084304/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Interstate/styles).
Jan, thank you very much. That helps a lot.

i'd say that would work.  
the spread on the interstate "W" and "A" is not so wide,  
but some outline modification would get you there.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311084304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/interwant_4263.png)

can't resist adding this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311084304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unclealfred_6686.png)
